div.p: SEE YOU THERE. THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
DO YOU KNOW THE GUY WILL FERRELL?
HE’S RUNNING AROUND PROMOTING HIS ANCHORMAN IMAGE.
HE PLAYS RON BURGUNDY. HE WAS IN NORTH DAKOTA DOING A
PROMOTION. THERE HE IS ON THE SET UP THERE.
HE WON’T COME ON "THE FACTOR" BECAUSE WE WOULD EXPOSE HIM FOR
THE CHARLATAN HE IS. YOU CAN RUN, BURGUNDY.
WE’RE GOING TO FINE YOU. MAN UP.
COME ON IN HERE. YOU HAVE A LOT TO LEARN ABOUT
BEING AN ANCHORMAN. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR
WEBSITE. PLEASE SPOUT OFF FROM ANYWHERE
